title: [Slim]No cross validation in inception?
body_html: I run the code for fine tune inception in slim. but I find that only train split is used when training. so is there no cross validation in inception? how should I stop training(just at the max_steps)? what's validation split for? (evaluate the trained model?)
body_text: I run the code for fine tune inception in slim. but I find that only train split is used when training. so is there no  cross validation in inception?  how should I stop training(just at the max_steps)? what's validation split for? (evaluate the trained model?)
